General.Description: Verge is proud to be a symbol of progress in the cryptocurrency world. This is a more secure, private and growing cryptography that is supported by bitcoin, a developer resource, and security tools.
General.Features: Verge Currency is a cryptocurrency designed for daily use. It improves on the original Bitcoin platform and aims to fulfill its original goal of providing fast, efficient and non-decentralized individuals and businesses the ability to make direct transactions while maintaining personal privacy.
General.Technology: Verge is an alternative crypto-based currency that tries to win the fame of both Dogecoin and Bitcoin and combines it with DASH's anonymous features. Block time is 30 seconds and coin operates through Proof of Work
